post.body: Up in a few.
Please choose something else. I really can't stomach that song. Sorry!
You must've missed my earlier post saying I would not play that song. ANything else?
Which one you want? NIN or Cash?
I need a new song. Can't play that.
So far, Clapton's Cocaine is the only song that fits this genre that I simply refuse to play. But that is subject to change.
Yeah, it's too early. 10 ET.
Thanks! Hope you have a great Christmas too.
Thanks for dropping by! Hope you have a great holiday too!
DUDE! I SUCK! I SKIPPED RIGHT OVER YOUR REQUEST! Sorry about that.
You too!
Thanks for dropping by! Have a great holiday!
Great choice! Up next!
Up in a few.
Up in a few!

Hello and welcome to Chag's Nameless Twitter Radio Show. Tonight we'll be playing drug songs. Get those requests in now!
In the meantime, feel free to read about my fantasy Christmas vs. the awful reality: http://tinyurl.com/6ymfmt
Hope everyone out there had as great of a day as I did! Hope you were able to spend it with family & friends. Happy Holidays!
Let's close things out with a dedication to a close friend. Here's Christmas Time For My Penis by The Vandals: http://tinyurl.com/7wrh94
You've been listening to Chag's Nameless Twitter Radio Show. Hope you enjoyed the show and thanks for coming out! Happy Holidays!
